select b.user_acct userAcct, b.user_name userName, b.sex sex, b.phone phone, b.email email, b.id_card idCard from t_customer a, t_sys_user b where a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_code = b.user_code
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and b.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
order by b.create_time desc
